sentence.Network_en: He refused to cut his hair due to his Rastafarian beliefs.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为信奉拉斯塔法里教，他拒绝剪去头发。

entry.tran: 拉斯塔法里教徒（把前埃塞俄比亚皇帝海尔·塞拉西奉为神来崇拜的牙买加宗教团体的成员，通常留长发）
entry.def: A Rastafarian is a member of a Jamaican religious group which considers Haile Selassie, the former Emperor of Ethiopia, to be God. Rastafarians often have long hair which they wear in a hairstyle called dreadlocks.

example.ex: He was one of the few thousand committed Rastafarians in South Africa.
example.tran: 他是南非仅有的几千名虔诚的拉斯塔法里教徒中的一员。

entry.tran: 拉斯塔法里教的;拉斯塔法里教徒的
entry.def: Rastafarian is used to describe Rastafarians and their beliefs and lifestyle.

example.tran: 拉斯塔法里教诗人本杰明·西番雅

example.ex: He refused to cut his hair due to his Rastafarian beliefs.
example.tran: 因为信奉拉斯塔法里教，他拒绝剪去头发。

means.word_mean: 1. of or pertaining to or characteristic of Rastafarianism or Rastafarians

auth_sentence.content: Rastafarian holy days This page lists important Rastafari festivals.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rastafarian holy days This page lists important Rastafari festivals.

auth_sentence.content: It is after the crowning of Selassie that the Rastafarian movement officially began.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is after the crowning of Selassie that the Rastafarian movement officially began.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is after the crowning of Selassie that the Rastafarian movement officially began.

auth_sentence.content: It was this Caribbean Essences commercial parody with Tracy Morgan being a Rastafarian.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was this Caribbean Essences commercial parody with Tracy Morgan being a Rastafarian.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was this Caribbean Essences commercial parody with Tracy Morgan being a Rastafarian.
